author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:
Several improvement in the Pixel payload inspector:
   * added Pixel Lorentz Angle maps 
   * added a dedicated unit test 
   * several graphical improvement in displaying the results.

#### PR validation:

`scramv1 b runtests` runs to completion.


#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

This PR is not a backport.
title: SiPixel Payload Inspector improvements
